text: Bever may refer to: *Bever, Belgium, a municipality in the Belgian province of Flemish Brabant *Bever, Switzerland, a municipality in the district of Maloja of the Canton of Grisons, Switzerland *Bever, a tributary to the river Ems *Bever, a tributary to the river Oste *Bever, a tributary to the river Weser *Bever, a tributary to the river Wupper
title: Bever
